QuestData.Title: Test of Mettle
QuestData.Description: Alright, friend. You've done us a favor or two, but that's not the true test of a person's courage.$B$BAround these parts, you're not a real hunter unless you wear your prey's skin.$B$B<Sergei unsheathes his skinning knife and hands it to you.>$B$BThe leader of those motherless orcs attacking our town is called Bonesnap; you'll find him at a camp further northwest.$B$BThat's right. You're going to skin the monster.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Sergeant Bonesnap northwest of Silverbrook and pass the Test of Mettle.
QuestData.CompletionText: The people in Silverbrook... they're not what they seem.
QuestData.RewardText: Don't do it, $n. The people that sent you here.... you shouldn't trust them.
